info.author: UNKNOWN
info.description:
Introduction
============

This product integrates Products.sqlpfgadapter_ into collective.megaphone_. 

For now, all it does is add "SQLPFGAdapter" to the addable types in a
"Megaphone Action" (megaphone 2) or "Action Letter" (megaphone < 2).

In the future, the sql storage might be a step in the megaphone wizard, which
this product could provide.

Compatibility
=============

Requires Products.sqlpfgadapter >= 0.1a2.

Should work on Plone 3 and Plone 4, collective.megaphone 1.x and 2.x.

Tested on Plone 3.3.5 with collective.megaphone 2.0b1 and
Products.sqlpfgadapter 0.1a2.

.. _Products.sqlpfgadapter: http://plone.org/products/sqlpfgadapter
.. _collective.megaphone: http://plone.org/products/megaphone

Changelog
=========

1.0 (2011-01-10)
----------------

- No functional change

0.1a1 (2010-09-22)
------------------

- Initial release
